member.name: T:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack
member.summary: This class defines a complete adpack object. It can be serialised or deserialised directly to the native format, and has handlers for easily adding new objects to the package.

member.name: F:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.Metadata
member.summary: This defines the metadata of the package, stored in metainfo.dat.

member.name: F:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.Files
member.summary: This defines the files to be stored in the package, as well as fileinfo.dat.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new, empty adpack file. The appid for the cache file to be minipulated.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.Serialize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Serialises the adpack to a file (ZIP).
member.param: A stream pointing to the file to write to.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPack.Deserialize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This deserializes an adpack from a file.

member.name: T:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry
member.summary: AdPackEntry is a class that defines a single record to be loaded into, or loaded from an adpack. It isn't designed to hold records from icontent.cache, as some of the data that is redundant isn't stored in the file format.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an empty AdPackEntry.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an AdPackEntry with no data block.
member.param: The description of the file. This is called the "title" parameter in filelist.dat.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates an AdPackEntry with a data block.
member.param: The description of the file. This is called the "title" parameter in filelist.dat.
The DDS image data (or BIK) to load into the file.

member.name: M:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry.SetDDSData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets the DDS data block to be 'data'.
member.param: The new contents of the data block to be inserted.

member.name: P:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry.DDSData
member.summary: Returns a copy of the DDS or BIK data stored in the data block.

member.name: P:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry.FileName
member.summary: The filename of the image to be used in the adpack file.

member.name: P:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry.Description
member.summary: The description of the file, aka, the "title".

member.name: P:au.id.micolous.apps.igaeditor.AdPackEntry.ContentType
member.summary: An IGA-style contentType number for the record.
